Job Title: Senior Civil Engineer

Location: Garden City, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Management

Description:
Our client is renowned for their innovative and comprehensive approach to complex construction, engineering, and architectural projects. With a rich history spanning nearly 50 years and a strong presence across key regions along both coasts, they have made a significant impact on national projects and landmarks through their expertise in significant transportation, infrastructure, and public building initiatives.
To support their continued growth and excellence, they are seeking a visionary and detail-oriented Senior Civil Engineer to lead their engineering initiatives towards new heights of innovation and efficiency.
This Role Offers:Competitive base salary plus outstanding benefits package including medical/dental/vision, 401K match, education reimbursement, and more.Relaxed schedule with a generous amount of PTO and paid holidays.Award winning, accredited learning facility focused on providing a diverse environment.Rich history with highly experienced leadership and a culture of mentorship and innovation.Exciting training and career growth opportunities, both hands-on and formal.
Focus:Perform and oversee civil engineering tasks such as zoning, site planning, and infrastructure design, including storm-water and utility coordination.Lead submissions and presentations to local authorities, utilities, and planning boards.Conduct site investigations to document conditions.Review and complete design calculations and assist in drawing and specification preparation.Manage project planning and inter-disciplinary coordination to ensure high-quality engineering outcomes.Address technical issues during construction, providing effective solutions.Apply project management and technical skills across various projects, from small restorations to major new constructions.Drive business growth by maintaining client relationships, seeking new opportunities, creating proposals, representing the firm externally, and mentoring junior engineers.
Skill Set:Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering.7+ yearsâ€™ experience in Civil Engineering, with significant project leadership and design experience.NY PE (Professional Engineer) license required.Demonstrated ability to provide guidance to junior level engineers.Deep understanding and application of local code requirements.Proficiency in various structural analysis software.Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to multitask and consistently meet deadlines.Proficiency in Auto-CAD and Civil 3D is a must.
About Blue Signal:Blue Signal is a leading executive search firm, specializing in engineering recruitment. Our engineering recruiting team has expertise placing high-performing talent in areas such as electrical, mechanical, civil, and telecom engineering. Learn more at bit.ly/46IAFRJ

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
